content.title: Come Say Hi
content.body:
501 Harris Avenue,
Bellingham, WA 98225
360-733-PAWS
(360-733-7297)

We are a stone's throw from downtown Fairhaven, in a building just in front of the Amtrak/Greyhound station near the Alaska Ferry. Our convenient location means you won't have to go far to come give your dog a great place to hang out while you enjoy a delicious, local beverage!

content.subtitle: Hours
content.body:
Mon - Fri: 11 AM to 9 PM
Sat, Sun: 11 AM to 11 PM
